Topic.Title: Why would Mayans/Mexicans End the World?

Message.Msg: la.,la.,nm.,kali, az., tx.

Great. America the Oldigarchy. The land of the ossified and the home of the senile. Oh say can you see? Not without my bifocals. I can see the headlines now. "On Tuesday, the entire government shut down indefinitely because Congress had to make a left turn across two lanes of traffic. In other news, negotiations with the Chinese screeched to a halt because the President is afraid that if he uses his phone he might break it. When asked what he does with his phone, the President says he keeps it in a drawer with some loose Werther's originals."

Why the he** do you people talk about cable news like anyone cares? I am not retired. I do not pay $1,000 a year for cable so I can sit on my couch watching #$%$ blabber about nothing all day. I get my news through my phone like a normal person. And why in the he** do you watch Fox Sunday morning in the privy? What is the matter with you? Nevermind, I don't want to know.
"Do you really think they'd give up that AARP discount?" Yep. We dropped our AARP membership when it supported Obamacare along with its Medicare cuts. The AARP hypocrisy was more than I could take.

Hypocrisy? Hyprocrisy is a person who absolutely refuses to pay for his stuff, and then condemns a law that finds reasonable savings in Medicare without cutting benefits one iota. It is absolutely on message for the AARP to support those savings, as AARP has always supported making Medicare more efficient and sustainable. AARP opposes benefit cuts. The hypocrite in this situation is you. And clearly so.

They will use any collapse to use as an excuse for more financial control by the usurious shysters that caused it all in the first place. Goldman-Sachs was the main mover in the derivatives scam that led to the housing collapse. Ex officers of that company now run every financial department in the government. The shills keep lying about the Kenyan being for the little guy. He's in lockstep with those stealing the whole country.

Topic.Title: Why would Mayans/Mexicans End the World?

Message.Msg: After the 1968 riots many questioned why, inner city people burned down their own neighborhoods. Here in Baltimore, we have blocks still abandoned buildings, that have been ignored for decades. I see every day here, legions of illegals, working to establish businesses in areas left to decay. Grant it, many of the businesses are of questionable character. Girlie bars, money transfer stations, machete shops, and illegal substance/head shops. I just wish these people would pay taxes.

"Yep, along with the the frequent "Redeem Your Free BestBuy $1000 Gift Card" text messages" I am also savvy enough to avoid spam, apparently. Here's a hint: do not give your mobile number to businesses. They will send you annoying text messages.

Message.Title: Wayne La Pierre For President
Message.Msg: What a no non-sense, common sense guy. It only makes sense to protect our children. The dems, Obama included, constantly mention, we need more Police Officers. Why can't we have a good guy with a gun, at every school? Even if they were successful at outlawing all the long guns, we'd still have to worry about pistols. This is a real, workable solution to a pressing problem, caused by the violence driven Hollyweird Media, that Obama puts on a pedestal. I own no weapons, but I joined the NRA Today. If the left is sucessful at destroying this American institution, only the criminals will have guns.

The financial manipulations that this Adminstration, (along with the Chinese debt buying), can't go on forever. The day of reckoning will come, sooner than many believe. Drastic spending cuts, now, ASAP, will send the signal to the world, that we are serious about improving our National Debt Crisis. When the plug is pulled, and things start going down the drain, stopping the whirlpool, ( race to the bottom), is harder than it appears..

Topic.Title: Marine chained to Bed in Mexico, Obama Vacations

Message.Msg: All Obama needs to do is make a phone call. Too busy destroying the economy to act?

Message.Title: Nice DIVI ........... good buy $33-34
Message.Msg: With the country in a mess...... a 5.3% dividend is a good place to park your cash.
An AR-15 for every classroom!
You need to buy a weapon. If a home invasion occurs in the middle of the night how are you going to protect your family. Get some safety training to go along with your new gun
Cliff or no cliff I like a 5.3% dividend. I am adding here. I will add more if we drop further.

I have two Dobermans. A Dobie for every classroom! (Now that I like). If you want to buy a gun for home protection, I'm all for it. Just not an assault rifle, or a gun with large magazines, or without a background check. I suggest a shotgun. Try not to lose any fingers (especially you, robfisk).. But I don't think turning our schools into armed camps is any type of solution for anything. You want to see more kids get shot? Put guns in the schools. After all, why make the shooter actually purchase and bring a gun into the school? That's inefficient. We can simply eliminate those steps by making guns available in the schools, using taxpayer money of course.
Totally agree. I have added to my position AGAIN.

Message.Title: Max Pain must be in the mid-30's.
Message.Msg: Hilarious watching the MM's tamping T down. I guess they got caught off guard on calls.
I'm waiting for $30.

No matter what homoerotic experiences you've had with guns previously, Jon, I'm not going to grab my crotch for you. The argument that we shouldn't make something illegal because people break the law is about the dumbest argument I've ever heard conservatives make. And that's saying alot, especially since you are also arguing it's a good idea to pepper our school systems with firearms.

I'm surrounded by Police, and those who shoot, here in my neighborhood. I know that likely won't help me, if someone decides they are doing a home invasion. Anything can happen, anywhere, at any time. But this is a low crime area. Most home invasions here in Maryland are drug related. If I lived in the Southwest, a border state, where illegal alien caused crime was rampant, I'd definitely be prepared.

The best animal you can have for protection, is getting harder, and harder to get. An ape. They work the best. In the inner city a guy kept one in his basement rowhome. He had no basement steps, and had to rely on a ladder rope to check on his pet. The story goes, some repairman, meter reader, had to get in the basement. The wife let him go down there to check on something. The poor guy was down there with his flashlight, looking at the meter, and he felt someone/some thing put a hand on his shoulder. He turned, flashed the light on the ape's face. He dropped his light, and ran out of the basemen, so fast, he ran screaming into the street, and was struck by a car. I always wanted to search the local papers to see if this is true. An old, retired TELCO type, swears this is a true story.

Message.Title: NASTY smack down today..
Message.Msg: ...on double volume.....I guess nobody wants to pay 40% div tax.

The government IS the criminal. Founding fathers understood this. Government is the primary killer of millions of people down through the centuries. Had those people been armed it would have been government thugs that died. Even in the Old Testament weapon control is mentioned. When the Phililistines over ran ancient Israel they banned Israelites from having forges. Why? So the couldn't make swords to defend themselves. Jesus Christ told his disciples to sell their coats and buy a sword. It's better to be cold than unarmed.

Message.Title: I'm scared, Maybe the World is Ending.
Message.Msg: I had to do a double take. It is true. I saw Obama wearing a Flag Pin (a US Flag Pin)? It wasn't a UN Pin, or an Obama re-election pin. The Media cut in close. Boehner wasn't wearing his. WHO DO THEY (THE OBAMA MEDIA MACHINE) THINK THEY ARE KIDDING??
Well, Sir since it seems the GoP as a whole have no brains. Let's have an IQ test before we elect these people Mich from Tenn looks and acts like a hilly billy rum runner.
Who cares if the GOV shuts down with the GOP the brakes have been on for nearly over two years. Mitch should go back to making moonshine. #$%$ should start slopping beer again.

Message.Title: Maryland State Police now in Balt City
Message.Msg: These guys usually have no power in our biggest City. But because of the out of control crime, these Officers have been quietly patrolling since September. The criminals aren't happy. Please be careful if you come here on vacation. I saw on Groupon, that many people are buying packages for $69 a night. A great value, but be careful. The only time I go downtown is if I'm with a cop friend. Carry if you can, and bring your next of kin contact info. Just in case

Message.Title: weapons
Message.Msg: How can you forecast that a maniac will cause harm to innocent people....the answer is you can't .The police react to a crime ...then they try to solve the crime...they as anyone else can not predict the crime .The end result is that so many die because we are not PSYCHIC ...NO they perish for we are fools that allow the TRASH of our society to commit their crimes and get prison sentences that are minimal ....if you use a weapon in the commission of a crime give a sentence of 25 years without the chance of parole...and then the sentence for the crime . Get the #$%$ off our streets !!!!
